remarks: Division of a positive number by both sides of 'less than'. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)
statement:
rpred.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR+ ) $.
rpaddcld.1 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR+ ) $.
ltdiv2d.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR+ ) $.
ltdiv2d $p |- ( ph -> ( A < B <-> ( C / B ) < ( C / A ) ) ) $.
